verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
And if thou <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go<s%>, behold, I will <S%H5062>smite<s%> all thy <S%H1366>borders<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs<s%>:

And the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall bring <S%H8317>forth<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly<s%>, which shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and into thy <S%H2315>bedchamber<s%> <S%H4904><s%>, and upon thy <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and upon thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and into thine <S%H8574>ovens<s%>, and into thy <S%H4863>kneadingtroughs<s%>: kneadingtroughs: or, dough
And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> both on thee, and upon thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and upon all thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> with thy <S%H4294>rod<s%> over the <S%H5104>streams<s%>, over the <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, and over the <S%H98>ponds<s%>, and cause <S%H6854>frogs<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%>, and brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6279>Intreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he may take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from me, and from my <S%H5971>people<s%>; and I will let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H6286>Glory<s%> over me: <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6279>intreat<s%> for thee, and for thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and for thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H3772>destroy<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from thee and thy <S%H1004>houses<s%>, that they may <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> only? Glory: or, Have this honour over me, etc when: or, against when to destroy: Heb. to cut off

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Be it according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>: that thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is none like unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>. To morrow: or, Against to morrow

And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from thee, and from thy <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and from thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and from thy <S%H5971>people<s%>; they shall <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> only.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> because <S%H1697>of<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> which he had <S%H7760>brought<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> out of the <S%H1004>houses<s%>, out of the <S%H2691>villages<s%>, and out of the <S%H7704>fields<s%>.
And they gathered them <S%H6651>together<s%> upon <S%H2563>heaps<s%>: and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H887>stank<s%>.

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7309>respite<s%>, he <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thy <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that it may become <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> so; for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it became <S%H3654>lice<s%> in <S%H120>man<s%>, and in <S%H929>beast<s%>; all the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> became <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%> to bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%>, but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not: so there were <S%H3654>lice<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%>, and upon <S%H929>beast<s%>.

Then the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, This is the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened<s%>, and he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; lo, he cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4325>water<s%>; and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

Else, if thou wilt not let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, behold, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies upon thee, and upon thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and upon thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and into thy <S%H1004>houses<s%>: and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies, and also the <S%H127>ground<s%> whereon they are. swarms: or, a mixture of noisome beasts, etc

And I will <S%H6395>sever<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>, in which my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>dwell<s%>, that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies shall <S%H1961>be<s%> there; to the <S%H4616>end<s%> thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H6304>division<s%> between my <S%H5971>people<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%>: to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shall this <S%H226>sign<s%> be. a division: Heb. a redemption to morrow: or, by to morrow

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so; and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and into his <S%H5650>servants'<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and into all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies. corrupted: or, destroyed

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> ye, <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not <S%H3559>meet<s%> so to <S%H6213>do<s%>; <S%H2005>for<s%> we shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>: lo, shall we <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and will they not <S%H5619>stone<s%> us?

We will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, as he shall <S%H559>command<s%> us.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will let you <S%H7971>go<s%>, that ye may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; only ye shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7368>very<s%> far <S%H7368>away<s%>: <S%H6279>intreat<s%> for <S%H1157>me<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I go <S%H3318>out<s%> from thee, and I will <S%H6279>intreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, from his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and from his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>: <S%H7535>but<s%> let not <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> deal <S%H2048>deceitfully<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%> in <S%H1115>not<s%> letting the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H6279>intreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and he <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, from his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and from his <S%H5971>people<s%>; there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> at this <S%H6471>time<s%> also, neither would he let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.
